text.description: The text will be shown in the button

type.description: What type of button will be implemented

testId.description: ID used to locate the element in unit test suites

style.description: Custom styling applicable for specific cases

color.description: Color based on bulma's color tokens

isLightColor.description: Will adjust the selected color with a ligther style

isInvertedColor.description: Will invert button's colors (typography in color and background in white or black)

isOutlined.description: Similar to `isInvertedColor`, but button's border will be colored

isRounded.description: Will add round borders to button's shape

isLoading.description: Will change `text` for a animated spinner, but will remain clickeable

isStatic.description: Similar to `isDisabled`, but will remove any color style

onClick.description: Click function, alone does not nothing, but can be reused for other components
